MUL1318.json.generated_data:
0 [USER] [find_restaurant] Hello, I'm trying to find an international restaurant in the east. Any ideas?
1 [SYSTEM] Yes, the Missing Sock is an international restaurant in the east in the cheap price range. Would you like a reservation?
2 [USER] [find_restaurant] No, please give me their post code instead.
3 [SYSTEM] The post code is cb 259aq.
4 [USER] [find_hotel] I also need a hotel on the Southside.
5 [SYSTEM] I have 1 hotel called the Lensfield Hotel located on 53-57 Lensfield Road.
6 [USER] [find_hotel] Can you tell me if it offers free parking? Also, how many stars is the Lensfield?
7 [SYSTEM] The Lensfield is a 3-star hotel. They do offer free parking.
8 [USER] [find_hotel] Can you look for a 2-star hotel in that area? If not available, then could you try one that is in the east?
9 [SYSTEM] There is one located in the east, Express by Holiday Inn Cambridge. It has free internet and parking. Would you like to book?
10 [USER] [book_hotel] Yes, I'd like to book 5 nights for 1 beginning on Tuesday. Could I get the reference number for that as well?
11 [SYSTEM] How many guests will be staying?
12 [USER] [NONE] Just one, thanks.
13 [SYSTEM] You are all set, the reference number is 9WZD62FF. Anything else that I can assist with?
14 [USER] [find_restaurant] What are the nearest diners by the hotel?
15 [SYSTEM] There is a Missing Sock off of Finders Corner Newmarket Road. It looks to be cheap and is on the east side of the city.
16 [USER] [chitchat] I wonder if there are any good dessert places nearby. I love trying out local sweets when I travel!
17 [SYSTEM] That sounds delightful! There are often hidden gems for desserts in the area. Let me check if there are any popular spots near the Missing Sock.
18 [USER] [book_taxi] Actually, I'd like to book a taxi from the hotel to The Missing Sock. I'd like to depart by 09:15.
19 [SYSTEM] Sure, I found you a blue Tesla; their contact number is 07980198100. By the way, there's a great bakery called Sweet Treats just a short walk from the restaurant, known for their pastries. Can I assist you with anything else?

PMUL3578.json.generated_data:
0 [USER] [find_restaurant] Hello, can you show me any moderately-priced restaurants in the Centre of town, please?
1 [SYSTEM] Yes, there are over 20 of various types, do you have any type of food that you are craving?
2 [USER] [find_restaurant] I am looking for Thai food.
3 [SYSTEM] I'm sorry, there isn't a Thai restaurant there. Any other ideas?
4 [USER] [find_restaurant] What about Asian oriental?
5 [SYSTEM] Yippee Noodle Bar meets your criteria. Would you like to book a table?
6 [USER] [book_restaurant] Yes, a table for four. Thank you.
7 [SYSTEM] What time and day were you planning on eating at the Yippee Noodle Bar?
8 [USER] [chitchat] You know, I really enjoy places that have a nice ambiance. It makes the meal feel special.
9 [SYSTEM] That’s a great point! A cozy atmosphere can really enhance the dining experience.
10 [USER] [chitchat] Exactly! I also love trying out new desserts. Do you think they have any unique options?
11 [SYSTEM] [Transition to ToD] I believe they do offer some interesting dessert choices, like mango sticky rice and coconut ice cream.  Now, back to your reservation—what time would you like to book for?
12 [USER] [find_restaurant] Actually, I don't need a reserved table after all. But, can I get their phone number please?
13 [SYSTEM] Sure, the number is 01223518111. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
14 [USER] [find_attraction] Yes, can you tell what parks are good in town?
15 [SYSTEM] I sure can. There are five parks in town. Would you prefer to visit one in a particular part of town or are you open on the location?
16 [USER] [find_attraction] Whatever park you think is the best one.
17 [SYSTEM] I like Sheep's Green and Lammas Land Park Fen Causeway, because I can pet all of the nice soft pretty animals. Would you like to play with the animals too?
18 [USER] [find_attraction] That sounds like it'll be fun to visit. What is the entrance fee, address, and phone number?
19 [SYSTEM] The free park is located at Fen Causeway, Newnham Road. The telephone number is 01223302580. May I help with anything else?

PMUL2068.json.generated_data:
0 [USER] [find_restaurant] We want to find a restaurant that serves unusual food.
1 [SYSTEM] Do you have a particular type of food you'd like to try?
2 [USER] [find_restaurant] No, just please make sure the food's unusual, located in the north and expensive.
3 [SYSTEM] Saigon city serves Asian oriental in the north part of town.
4 [USER] [find_restaurant] That's pretty offensive to call Asian oriental unusual. I'm looking for a restaurant that serves food labelled as unusual.
5 [SYSTEM] I have no restaurants that list their food as unusual, do you have any other preferences?
6 [USER] [find_restaurant] Ok, how about Chinese food? Still expensive and in the north please.
7 [SYSTEM] Yes, there's a place called the Hotpot.
8 [USER] [chitchat] I wonder if they have any unique dishes on the menu. I love trying things that are a bit out of the ordinary!
9 [SYSTEM] That sounds exciting! Hotpot often features some creative dishes, so you might find something interesting there.
10 [USER] [chitchat] I also enjoy a good atmosphere when dining out. Do you think the place has a nice vibe?
11 [SYSTEM] Absolutely! Hotpot is known for its lively atmosphere, which can really enhance your dining experience.
12 [USER] [book_restaurant] Let me have a reservation at Hotpot on Friday, thank you.
13 [SYSTEM] Ok, how many people and what time?
14 [USER] [book_restaurant] 7 people at 19:45 on Friday.
15 [SYSTEM] I was able to make a booking for the Hotpot. Your reservation number is 55CAP7FC.
16 [USER] [find_attraction] Awesome. Now can you tell me if there is a swimming pool nearby the restaurant? I love to swim after egg rolls!
17 [SYSTEM] There are two in the north; Jesus Green Outdoor Pool and Kings Hedges Learner Pool. Would you like the location of either of those?
18 [USER] [find_attraction] Can you pick the best swimming pool and get me the postcode and phone number please?
19 [SYSTEM] I'm going to recommend the Kings Hedges Learner Pool located at Jedburgh Court, Kings Hedges. The postcode is CB 4 2XH. The phone number is 01223 353248.
20 [USER] [book_taxi] I also need to book a taxi between the hotel and restaurant. I need to arrive by 19:45.
21 [SYSTEM] What time do you need to leave by?
22 [USER] [find_train] I just need it to arrive by the time the restaurant was booked.
23 [SYSTEM] How many people are traveling?
24 [USER] [book_taxi] 7 people for the taxi.
25 [SYSTEM] Ok, you are booked for a 19:45 arrival time, the taxi is a white Audi. Is there anything else?
26 [USER] [book_taxi] Can I get the contact number for the taxi as well, please?
27 [SYSTEM] Contact number is 07625009528. Can I help you with anything else?

PMUL2406.json.generated_data:
0 [USER] [find_attraction] I want to know where I can go in the town centre of Cambridge.
1 [SYSTEM] There are many places to go in the centre. Are you looking for an attraction or restaurant?
2 [USER] [find_attraction] An attraction of any type would be fine as long as it's in the centre, please.
3 [SYSTEM] I could recommend old schools. It is architecture and free to see. Would you like more information?
4 [USER] [find_attraction] Yes tell me one of those recommendations.
5 [SYSTEM] Old Schools is an architectural attraction on Trinity Lane that has no entrance fee. Their phone number is 01223332320. Can I help you with anything else?
6 [USER] [find_attraction] Can you provide me the full address including postal code? Thanks.
7 [SYSTEM] The address listed for Old Schools is simply Trinity Lane. And their postcode is cb 21tt. Is there anything more I can do for you today?
8 [USER] [find_restaurant] Yes, I would also like to find an expensive restaurant in the same area.
9 [SYSTEM] What kind of food would you like and what price range?
10 [USER] [find_restaurant] I would prefer British food and an expensive price range if possible.
11 [SYSTEM] I have three restaurants in the town centre that meet your needs. Might I suggest the Cambridge Chop House or Fitzbillies restaurant?
12 [USER] [find_attraction] Can you please recommend one and give me their postcode and phone number?
13 [SYSTEM] The Cambridge Chop House is a favorite of mine. It's located at 1 Kings Parade. Would you like me to book it for you?
14 [USER] [chitchat] That sounds great! I love a good steak. Do you know if they have any vegetarian options too?
15 [SYSTEM] Yes, they do offer vegetarian dishes alongside their steak options, so there should be something for everyone.
16 [USER] [chitchat] That's good to know! I always like to have a variety of choices when dining out.
17 [SYSTEM] [Transition to ToD] Absolutely, having options makes the experience much better. Now, would you like me to book a table at the Cambridge Chop House for you?
18 [USER] [book_taxi] No thanks, but I am interested in getting a taxi from Old Schools to the Cambridge Chop House. Can you help?
19 [SYSTEM] What time will you be needing the taxi service for?
20 [USER] [book_taxi] I would like to leave Old Schools by 19:00.
21 [SYSTEM] Okay, you're all set! A red Lexus will be picking you up; the contact number is 07885505407. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

PMUL1912.json.generated_data:
0 [USER] [book_train] Can you help me book some train tickets?
1 [SYSTEM] Sure! Where are you departing from and what is your destination?
2 [USER] [find_train] I am leaving from Cambridge.
3 [SYSTEM] I'll need to get some more information. Can you tell me your destination and when you will be travelling?
4 [USER] [find_train] I am going to Bishops Stortford at 12:45 on Thursday.
5 [SYSTEM] You would like to leave Bishops Stortford at 12:45?
6 [USER] [book_train] Yes, on Thursday. Can you book me a train for 3 people please?
7 [SYSTEM] Okay, the TR 2929 leaves at 11:29 and arrives at 12:07. Would you like me to book this?
8 [USER] [book_train] Yes, one ticket to Hogwarts please?
9 [SYSTEM] Ah, sorry, unfortunately there are no trains leaving to Hogwarts after September 1st.
10 [USER] [book_train] I am sorry, poor joke. I am leaving Cambridge going to Bishops Stortford, leaving after 12:45 on Thursday, need 3 tickets and ref number.
11 [SYSTEM] Booking was successful, the total fee is 30.29 GBP payable at the station. Reference number is: 2WI5Y9KV. Anything else I can do?
12 [USER] [find_hotel] Yes, I am looking for a place to stay that includes free Wi-Fi and is a guesthouse in the expensive price range with free parking as well.
13 [SYSTEM] There are no guesthouses that fit your needs. Would you like a hotel? There are several available.
14 [USER] [find_hotel] How about one that is cheap?
15 [SYSTEM] There are several cheap guesthouses in all areas of Cambridge. Do you have an area preference?
16 [USER] [find_hotel] I am not looking in any specific area. A cheap guesthouse with free Wi-Fi and parking would be great. Can you recommend one?
17 [SYSTEM] Absolutely! I recommend Autumn House. Would you like a reservation?
18 [USER] [book_hotel] Yes, I would like a reservation. Thank you.
19 [SYSTEM] I can help with that! I just need to know your arrival date, the number of people that will be staying, and how many nights you'd like to stay.
20 [USER] [chitchat] By the way, do you know if there are any nice cafes nearby? I love trying local coffee spots when I travel.
21 [SYSTEM] That sounds lovely! There are a few great cafes near Autumn House, including one that’s known for its artisanal coffee and pastries.
22 [USER] [chitchat] Oh, that sounds perfect! I really enjoy a good pastry with my coffee.
23 [SYSTEM] [Transition to ToD] I’ll make sure to note that you might want to check out the cafe nearby for some delicious pastries during your stay. Now, back to your reservation. I have your reservation for 3 people for 2 nights, arriving on Tuesday.
24 [USER] [book_hotel] Thanks, I need for 3 people for 2 nights. Arrival is on Tuesday.
25 [SYSTEM] Sure, I have your reservation and the reference number is ZYSDXL 09. Enjoy your stay and the local cafes!
PMUL1912.json.source_data:

21 [SYSTEM] Sure I have your reservation and the reference number is ZYSDXL09 .

MUL0326.json.generated_data:
0 [USER] [find_train] Hello, I'm looking for a train to Birmingham New Street that will leave on Wednesday.
1 [SYSTEM] I have trains departing Cambridge to Birmingham New Street Wednesday every hour starting at 5:01, is there a particular time you would like to depart at?
2 [USER] [find_train] Departing time, no, but I'd like to arrive at Birmingham New Street by 16:45.
3 [SYSTEM] I can get you there at 16:44, if you like. TR8860 will depart Cambridge at 14:01. Would you like to book tickets on that train?
4 [USER] [find_train] No. I require the travel time, price, and train ID.
5 [SYSTEM] That's Train TR 8860. Travel time is 163 minutes. The ticket costs 75.10 pounds. Can I help with anything else?
6 [USER] [find_restaurant] I'm looking for a place to dine, preferably an Indian restaurant.
7 [SYSTEM] I found 22 restaurants, do you have a preference of area or price range?
8 [USER] [find_restaurant] I'd like something cheap and in the centre, please.
9 [SYSTEM] I have three locations fitting those criteria. The Kohinoor, The Gandhi, and Mahal of Cambridge. Should I book you at any of these locations?
10 [USER] [chitchat] By the way, I really enjoy trying different types of naan. Do you know if any of these places have a good selection?
11 [SYSTEM] That's a great choice! Indian restaurants often have a variety of naan options. I can check the menus for you.
12 [USER] [chitchat] That would be awesome! I also love a place with a nice ambiance. It makes the meal so much more enjoyable.
13 [SYSTEM] [Transition to ToD] Absolutely, ambiance can really enhance the dining experience. I'll look for a restaurant that not only has great naan but also a pleasant atmosphere. Now, back to your restaurant options. The Kohinoor is known for its cozy setting and has a good selection of naan. Would you like to book there?
14 [USER] [book_restaurant] Yes, please. I'd like a table for 1 on Wednesday at 12:15 at The Kohinoor.
15 [SYSTEM] I'm sorry, there are no tables available at Kohinoor at that time. Would you like to book another day or time?
16 [USER] [book_restaurant] How about 11:15?
17 [SYSTEM] Okay, you're booked for 11:15. Your reference number is FN32JWUO. Can I help with anything else?
18 [USER] [book_taxi] Yes, could you also book me a taxi to the nearest hotel?
19 [SYSTEM] Sure, when do you want to be picked up?
